info.name: Davíð Phuong Xuan Nguyen
info.about:
Hi, my name is Davíð.
I'm 22 years old, originally from Vietnam and raised in Iceland. I'm an everything software and technology enthusiast with a passion for design and pretty things.
 Feel free to reach out if you have ideas you want to talk about, wether it is related to technology, design or something else.

content.title: LS Retail
content.subtitle: Developer
content.description:
I was hired as a summer intern developer at LS Retail and worked there for two summers. I was lucky enough to get handed very real projects on both occasions.
 For the first summer, my task was integrating SAP Business One HANA (ERP-solution) with our point-of-sale solution LS One, where I worked mostly in .NET with C#.
 Year later I was assigned the role to integrate LS One with an in-house kitchen display system.

content.title: University of Iceland
content.subtitle: Research and teaching assistant
content.description:
In my final year of bachelor's studies at the University of Iceland, I worked there as a research assistant. The aim of the research project I participated in was to use simulation models to examine the interplay between technological development and innovation.
In the fall before, I was a teaching assistant for an introduction course in programming. The course used Java to introduce basic practices in computer programming.

content.title: Isavia
content.subtitle: Passenger service
content.description:
I worked in passenger service at Keflavik Airport, in the summer of 2017.
Our responsibility there was, e.g. to help passangers, assist with passenger flow control, manage the service desks and more.

content.title: University of Iceland
content.subtitle: BSc Software Engineering
content.description: I went straight to university after having finsihed junior collage and chose to study software engineering. In 2020, I received my BSc degree.

content.title: Reykjavik Junior College
content.subtitle: ‘Stúdentspróf‘
content.description:
I attended Reykjavik Junior Collage with focus on math and physics.
After four years I received my 'Stúdentspróf' there, which corresponds roughly to A-levels or a High School Diploma.

content.title: inline
content.subtitle: Web application
content.description:
For my final project while studying software engineering, I created inline.
It is a modern web-based queue management system (QMS) and its purpose is to replace traditional QMSs where instead of paper tickets, customers get a digital ticket via SMS.

content.title: Vrúmm
content.subtitle: App Android/iOS
content.description:
In the summer of 2018, me and my friend created the app Vrúmm. It was released in the beginning of 2019, for both iOS and Android.
Vrúmm is a platform for users to sell and buy cars. Users can create an advertisement for a car, browse other cars and message users through the app.
